snippet: As new benefits flow to top conferences and sports, some involved in the less lucrative areas of the N.C.A.A. worry they will soon have even fewer resources.
abstract: Marc Tracy On College Sports column; NCAA appears to be favoring most popular and lucrative sports especially at schools in Big 5 conferences.
lead_paragraph: As new benefits flow to top conferences and sports, some involved in the less lucrative areas of the N.C.A.A. worry they will soon have even fewer resources.

headline.print_headline: In N.C.A.A.’s Varied Landscape, Some Open Floodgates While Others Fear Drought
headline.main: In N.C.A.A.’s Varied Landscape, Some Open Floodgates While Others Fear Drought
